message: I'm testing a Chrome extension and the KRL is not updating in the browser app after I deploy it from app builder. (I tested adding some code and it's not showing up.) Any ideas?
when you use the bookmarklet to launch your app do you get the updated KRL working ?
no, bookmarklet in Chrome is not getting updated KRL (via Save, not Deploy)
Okay, I am experiencing the same problem then you
when you modify a ruleset, how long does it take for you to save it in the appbuilder?
i'm getting similar behavior in Firefox now
quite a long time.. up to 30 seconds for a relatively small app
Firefox apps are not updating for bookmarklet or extension
25 seconds is the average time for me but the code won't load afterwards
Things appear to be working this morning. Saves are back to being fast and apps are getting updated with changes.
I can confirm that. I feel released, I can disarm.
